attributes.action: give serial supporting actor Tony Gardner his own sitcom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For too long now we have stood by as our nation's greatest "young David Cann lookalike" languishes without a primetime sitcom starring role on his imdb page. His neat hair and sensible face are clearly deserving of wider exposure.

We the undersigned urge the Prime Minister to take action immediately to rectify what will otherwise become one of history's greatest regrets.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
